AdViewModel.Description:
2017 Ford Fusion SE FWD, Leather Heated Power Seats, Navigation, Bluetooth, Backup Camera, Dual-Climate Control, Parking Sensor, Multi-Media Screen and More! Clean CARFAX!

All vehicles come with the following at no additional cost:

- Certified with safety inspection included

- Full detailed history of the vehicle

- Free Warranty for 3-Months or 3000km

- Free Delivery in southwestern Ontario (Chatham-Kent, Essex, Belle River, Leamington, Windsor, LaSalle, Sarnia, London, Cambridge, Kitchener, Hamilton, Mississauga, Toronto)

- No hidden fees, asking price plus HST and licensing
